response.overview: Happily Married couple has an uninvited guest in their life. The third person seems to be having a purpose to teach an important lesson. Huge chaos happens between the couple. Their day to day life is decided by the third person. Who is this person? Is he known to the couple before? What issues that they undergo to understand a bitter truth forms the interesting story.
response.title: Sonnadhe Tirippi Tirippi Solladhe
